entry.title: Median Filtering with Python and OpenCV

link.title: Median Filtering with Python and OpenCV

entry.content:
Median Filtering

Computer vision is a fascinating subset of artificial intelligence. The fundamentals of computer vision start with the numerical representation of images and the elementary methods for manipulating them. Check out my brief discussion about median filtering using Python and OpenCV!

Median Filtering with Python and OpenCV

entry.title: Edge Detection with Python
entry.content:
In computer vision, the detection of edges is utilized to differentiate one object from another (or the background), capture changes in physical properties, and capture important features. Check out my discussion of the basics of edge detection!

Edge Detection with Python 101
entry.summary: In computer vision, the detection of edges is utilized to differentiate one object from another (or the background), capture changes in physical properties, and capture important features. Check out my discussion of the basics of edge detection!
